text: Brenda Marjorie Hale, Baroness Hale of Richmond , known as Lady Hale (born 31 January 1945), is a British judge. She was President of the Supreme Court of the United Kingdom from 2017 to 2020.Senior Judiciary List , Ministry of Justice. In 2004, she joined the House of Lords as a Lord of Appeal in Ordinary. She is the only woman to have been appointed to this position. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Yorkshire Category:Law lords
title: Brenda Hale, Baroness Hale of Richmond
